items.sentence: You can\'t really expect to get better at French if you don\'t study.
I won\'t go to all the meetings, but I\'ll try to go to some of them.
My leg\'s gone to sleep, so whatever you do, don\'t touch my leg now.
Tom pretended that he didn\'t care that Mary was going out with John.
Tom just couldn\'t resist teasing Mary about the way she was dressed.
